data.eml:eml: A new species of sponge-dwelling amphipod, Polycheria spongoteras sp. nov., from Spirits Bay, Northland, New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peart, Rachael A., Spong, Keren, Sutherland, Judy, Kelly, Michelle (2019): A new species of sponge-dwelling amphipod, Polycheria spongoteras sp. nov., from Spirits Bay, Northland, New Zealand. Zootaxa 4674 (1): 127-141, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.1.7
